description: Pulmonary emboli refer to blood clots that block the pulmonary arteries, which carry blood from the heart to the lungs.

attributes.name: Presence
attributes.description: Indicates whether pulmonary emboli are present or absent.

attributes.name: Stage
attributes.description: Indicates the stage of the pulmonary emboli.

attributes.name: Location
attributes.description: Indicates the location of the pulmonary emboli.

values.name: Lobar
values.description: Lobar branch of the pulmonary artery

values.name: Segmental
values.description: Segmental branch of the pulmonary artery

values.name: Subsegmental
values.description: Subsegmental branch of the pulmonary artery

attributes.name: Number
attributes.description: Indicates the number of pulmonary emboli.

attributes.name: Burden
attributes.description: Indicates the burden of pulmonary emboli.

attributes.name: Right heart strain
attributes.description: Indicates the presence or absence of right heart strain associated with pulmonary emboli.

attributes.name: Pulmonary hypertension
attributes.description: Indicates the presence or absence of pulmonary hypertension associated with pulmonary emboli.

attributes.name: Pulmonary infarction
attributes.description: Indicates the presence or absence of pulmonary infarction associated with pulmonary emboli.

attributes.name: Pulmonary artery aneurysm
attributes.description: Indicates the presence or absence of pulmonary artery aneurysm associated with pulmonary emboli.

attributes.name: Pulmonary hemorrhage
attributes.description: Indicates the presence or absence of pulmonary hemorrhage associated with pulmonary emboli.
